misinformation.title: Urgent Update on Gun Control Laws
misinformation.content: BREAKING: A new report from the CDC claims that 80% of gun owners support mandatory background checks! ðŸ“Š This shocking data is being buried by the NRA! We must act NOW to ensure our safety! Sign the petition here: www.change.org/guncontrol #GunControlNow #SafetyFirst

rebuttal.content: The claim that the NRA is 'burying' CDC data indicating 80% of gun owners support mandatory background checks lacks evidence. No credible reports substantiate this assertion of suppression. While surveys on gun ownership and background checks exist, the specific figure and its alleged suppression by the NRA are not corroborated by verifiable data. Itâ€™s crucial to verify claims before spreading them, especially on significant issues like gun control.
